    • checkWord

      public boolean checkWord(String toCheck) throws IOException
      Takes in a string from caller and will check to see if the word is valid for wordle, is in the dictionary that contains all 5 letter words
      Parameters:
      toCheck - String to check for existence
      Returns:
      True if the word exists in the full Wordle dirctionary, false if not
      Throws:
      IOException
